ClientWebPart.Name: EasyPrintAppPart
ClientWebPart.Title: Easy Print
ClientWebPart.Description: This web part displays all of the links to documents in a given list, and combines the selected documents into a single PDF document.

Property.Name: ListTitle
Property.WebDescription: Enter the title of the Links List that resides in this site.

Property.Name: ButtonText
Property.WebDescription: The text that will be displayed on the button to combine all of the documents into a sigle PDF document.

Property.Name: MaxNumberOfItems
Property.WebDescription: The maximum number of documents that will be available to combine into a single PDF document. If the value is 0 or less, a default of 100 will be used.
